text: Beverly Reid O'Connell (May 12, 1965 â€“ October 8, 2017) was an American judge. She served as United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Central District of California from April 30, 2013 until her death on October 8, 2017. She was nominated by President Barack Obama. She was born in Ventura, California. O'Connell died on October 8, 2017 at a hospital in Santa Monica, California while being in a coma after suffering from a brain aneurysm at the age of 52.Federal Judge Dies After Giving Speech to California State Bar Function, Santa Monica Observer (October 9, 2017).Passing of the Honorable Beverly Reid O'Connell, United States District Court for the Central District of California. ==References== ==Other websites== *FJC Bio Category:1965 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from intracranial aneurysm Category:American judges Category:Politicians from California Category:People from Ventura, California
title: Beverly Reid O'Connell
